title: Pre-UFYB 9: Mid-Year Review Meltdown
itunes:title: Pre-UFYB 9: Mid-Year Review Meltdown
description:
It’s the beginning of July, and that means one thing for a lot of you – mid-year reviews.

Today, we delve into the outcomes of mid-year reviews and why they bring up so much anxiety about your performance and career. Tune in to discover a step-by-step process for successfully navigating your performance review and find out how you can use this information to take your practice to the next level. No meltdown required.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelawyerstresssolution.com/midyearreview
